story:
Once upon a time, in the lush and beautiful island of Sri Lanka, there was a small village nestled in the heart of a dense jungle. The villagers lived in harmony with the animals and the natural beauty that surrounded them. They were simple people, who worked hard and lived close to the earth.

One day, a young boy named Thilina, who lived in this village, went out into the jungle to explore. As he wandered deeper into the jungle, he came across a small clearing, where he saw the most beautiful bird he had ever laid eyes on. The bird was shimmering with all the colors of the rainbow, and its song was so sweet and melodious that Thilina was instantly captivated.

Thilina approached the bird slowly, not wanting to scare it away. As he got closer, the bird looked at him with its bright, intelligent eyes, and Thilina felt a connection to this magnificent creature. He knew that he had to have this bird as his very own pet.

But the bird was no ordinary bird. It was a magical bird, known as the "Rainbow Bird of Sri Lanka," and it could only be caught by someone who was pure of heart and had the courage to follow their dreams.

Thilina knew that he was pure of heart, but he wasn't sure if he had the courage to catch the bird. But he was determined to try. So, he spent the next few days learning everything he could about the bird and its habits. He studied its movements, its favorite foods, and its favorite hiding places.

Finally, the day came when Thilina felt ready. He rose early in the morning, packed a small bag with some food and water, and set out into the jungle. He tracked the bird for hours, following its song as it led him deeper and deeper into the jungle.

Just as the sun was beginning to set, Thilina saw the bird perched on a low branch, singing its beautiful song. He approached it slowly, not wanting to scare it away. As he got closer, the bird looked at him with its bright, intelligent eyes, and Thilina felt his heart fill with courage.

With a swift and sure motion, Thilina reached out and caught the bird in his hands. The bird didn't struggle, but instead, it looked at him with what seemed like a smile. Thilina knew that he had succeeded in catching the magical Rainbow Bird of Sri Lanka.

Thilina took the bird back to his village, where he was greeted with cheers and applause from the villagers. They had never seen such a beautiful bird before, and they were all eager to hear its song.

From that day on, Thilina and the Rainbow Bird became inseparable. They went on many adventures together, exploring the jungle and discovering new and wonderful things. And every night, before they went to sleep, the Rainbow Bird would sing its beautiful song, filling the air with magic and wonder.

And so, Thilina and the Rainbow Bird lived happily ever after, surrounded by the beauty and magic of the Sri Lankan jungle.

The end.

Goodnight, my dear son. May your dreams be filled with magic and wonder, just like Thilina and the Rainbow Bird.
